body_content.explanation: a short journey made by a group of people, usually for pleasure or education:
examples: Every year the professor takes her students on an outing to the archives of the Library of Congress.
Rosie's going on a class/school outing to the Wildlife Park.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when it is made public that a famous person is gay when he or she wanted to keep this information private:
examples: There have been several outings of well-known movie stars recently.
